title: Context Frontmatter
description: Validates the YAML frontmatter of context files in .project/context/. Context files represent content likely to be loaded into AI context â€” local documents, specs, diagrams, or fetchable remote URLs. Supports both companion metadata files (with a 'file' pointer) and remote resource descriptors.

file.description: Path to a companion file (relative to the context directory) that this metadata describes.

auto_include.description: Configuration for _index.md to auto-discover context files by pattern. Only applicable in _index.md files.

patterns.description: Glob patterns for files to auto-include as context.

exclude.description: Glob patterns for files to exclude from auto-inclusion.

max_file_size.description: Maximum file size for auto-included files (e.g., "1MB").
